Question: Unusually, this person was a Novice-class licensee—the entry level license—for his entire, and long, tenure in the hobby.
Hints: This person lived in Kansas City, Missouri, until he was ten, when his family moved to Houston, Texas.
This person wrote a syndicated opinion column for King Features Syndicate.
The main content of the papers documents this person's career with CBS News between 1950 and 1981.
